title: Condusivâ€™s Diskeeper 16 with DRAM caching - Trial Reset
description:
Condusivâ€™s Diskeeper 16 with DRAM caching - Trial Reset
This will reset the 30 day trial for Condusiv's latest and greatest Diskeeper release.

Everyone knows the frustration of a WindowsÂ® system becoming progressively slower the longer it is used and burdened with more software and data.

Condusivâ€™s DiskeeperÂ® 16 with DRAM caching guarantees to fix worst performing physical servers or PCs with faster than new performance. Instead of â€œdefragging,â€ Diskeeper 16â€™s newest patented engine ensures large, clean contiguous writes from Windows so fragmentation is no longer an issue for HDDs or SSDs. This eliminates the â€œdeath by a thousand cutsâ€ scenario of small, tiny writes that inflates I/Os per second, robs throughput, and shortens the lifespan of HDDs and SSDs alike. Diskeeper 16 electrifies Windows system performance to operate faster than new with the addition of dynamic memory caching - using idle DRAM to serve hot reads without creating an issue of memory starvation or resource contention.

1. Install
2. Use for 30 days
3. After trial
4. Stop Diskeeper in Services
5. Run Diskeeper 16 Trial Reset.bat as administrator (cmd will automatically close)
6. Start Diskeeper in Services
7. Open Diskeeper program and viola a brand spanking new 30 day trial

Note: test this after 1 day and see if 29 days reset to 30 days
